title: Clearings Index of Business for United States
notes:
Series Is Presented Here As Two Variables--(1)--Original Data, 1875-1929 (2)--Original Data 1919-1938. Data Are Based On A 1936 Revision, Cover Bank Debits In 140 Cities Outside New York City, And Are Adjusted For Secular Trend And Price Changes On A Three Month Moving Average. March 1933 Unavailable Due To Bank Holiday. Source: Furnished Direct In Mimeograph Form By The Federal Reserve Bank Of New York.

This NBER data series m12020b appears on the NBER website in Chapter 12 at http://www.nber.org/databases/macrohistory/contents/chapter12.html.

NBER Indicator: m12020b
